mention.text: the oil pipeline between huila department and barrancabermeja
the second time in less than 1 month that terrorists have attacked the oil pipeline operated by houston oil and ecopetrol
the cano limon-covenas oil pipeline dynamited on the night of 12
the arauca river caused by the 7 july attack against the cano limon-covenas oil pipeline
